mapper.select: SELECT a.member_id as memberId --//sunmi post_id => project_id로 오라클 칼럼명 변경함 -- , a.project_id as projectId , a.apply_part as applyPart , a.rdate , b.name , b.nickname , b.company , b.position , b.img , b.memo FROM Applicant a, Member b WHERE a.project_id = #{projectId} AND a.member_id = b.member_id AND a.success = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO applicant (member_id, project_id, apply_part, success, rdate, progress, score, upvote) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{projectId}, #{applyPart}, #{success}, sysdate, 0, #{score, jdbcType=NULL}, #{upvote, jdbcType=NULL})
